data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Dehong Dai and Jingpo, Yunnan, China, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Dehong Dai and Jingpo, Yunnan, China

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Dehong Dai and Jingpo.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Dehong Dai and Jingpo, Yunnan, China to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 710,561 believers in Dehong Dai and Jingpo.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the De'ang, Rumai people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Lord, we pray for the believers in Dehong Dai and Jingpo, Yunnan, China to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 710,561 believers in Dehong Dai and Jingpo to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 8,656,039 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.focus_label: Dehong Dai and Jingpo, Yunnan, China

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Dehong Dai and Jingpo who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
